GLint utilities::getOpenGlImageFormat ( Format  format)
inline

Will return the OpenGL compatible format of the given image Format 'format'.

If no known compatible OpenGL format is found, FORMAT_UNKNOWN is returned.

Parameters
format
Returns
The OpenGL compatible format of the given image Format 'format', or FORMAT_UNKNOWN if no known compatible OpenGL format is found.
